meanings.definition: A fungal disease of rye and other cereals, producing black elongated fruiting bodies that contain ergotamine.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the ergots growing on his rye plants.
meanings.sent2: The ergots on the cereal grains were causing concern among the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The ergots decided to throw a party on the rye field.
meanings.sent4: The ergots spread across the field like a dark shadow, affecting the crops.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ergots on the rye was like a warning sign of trouble ahead.

meanings.definition: A fungus that infects various cereal plants and forms compact black masses of branching filaments that replace many of the grains of the host plant.
meanings.sent1: The black masses of ergots took over the wheat fields.
meanings.sent2: Farmers had to deal with the damage caused by the ergots in their crops.
meanings.sent3: The ergots played hide and seek among the cereal plants.
meanings.sent4: The presence of ergots in the grains was like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The infestation of ergots turned the once golden fields into a dark nightmare.
